Blog.post: The Word became flesh and made his dwelling among us. We have seen his glory, the glory of the One and Only, who came from the Father, full of grace and truth. ~JN 1:14~
"...and anyone who does not take his cross and follow me is not worthy of me. Whoever finds his life will lose it, and whoever loses his life for my sake will find it." ~Mathew 10:38 - 39~

Now Thomas (called Didymus), one of the Twelve, was not with the disciples when Jesus came. [25] So the other disciples told him, "We have seen the Lord!" But he said to them, "Unless I see the nail marks in his hands and put my finger where the nails were, and put my hand into his side, I will not believe it." ~John 20:24 and 25 ~ urlLink http://www.jesuspainter.com/id19.htm

"Righteous Father, though the world does not know you, I know you, and they know that you have sent me. [26] I have made you known to them, and will continue to make you known in order that the love you have for me may be in them and that I myself may be in them." ~John 17: 25 and 26 ~

Later, knowing that all was now completed, and so that the Scripture would be fulfilled, Jesus said, "I am thirsty." [29] A jar of wine vinegar was there, so they soaked a sponge in it, put the sponge on a stalk of the hyssop plant, and lifted it to Jesus' lips. [30] When he had received the drink, Jesus said, "It is finished." With that, he bowed his head and gave up his spirit. ~John 19:28-30 ~

its been a while since i last posted and i cant wait until i go to Youth Jam b/c i feel as if im drifting away from god and i kno that happened last year at Jam i changed in so many ways i jus felt so good and i was so close to god and it was the best feeling in the world. and i hope if u never been and you go you wont come back to same as you left. well ill talk to everyone later. GOD BLESS! "I've found someone to die for because he died for me first." "Give all you worries to him because he care about you."1 Peter 5:7 "Do not repay evil with evil or insult with insult, but with blessing, because to this you were called so that you may inherit a blessing"1 Peter 3:9 "Trust in the Lord with all thine heart and lean not into thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge Him and He will direct thy path." Proverbs 3:5 "THE LORD WILL FIGHT FOR YOU; YOU NEED ONLY TO BE STILL." EXODUS 14:14 And my Favorite

The NewsBoys were so much fun!! omg! Seriously! i felt closer to kim witch is a good thing (sometimes) b/c sometimes i feel like she hates being around me, but oh well. theres something buggin me. but idk how to put it into words. well nvm then. ill talk to ya'al later! *GoD bLeSs* **Emmi**

well tomarrow i get to see the NewsBoys at the Ohio State Fair and i can't wait! The NewBoys are one of my favorite bands, there right up there with AudioA, Kutless, Falling up and Across The Sky! i love how all the mebers really truly love god and the only reason they do wut they do it b/c they wanna show everyone gods love and i admire them for that. and i hope they keep doing wut they do b/c there one of the reasons i am who i am today.im gonna have so much fun! i cant wait. well good night all. love ya lots! GoD bLeSs! **Emi**
